definition: to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: But by then, Lee and his men had crossed safely back into Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 但此时此刻，李将军及其残部已安全抵达弗吉尼亚。

sentences.english: General Meade lost so many men that he was in no hurry to chase General Lee.
sentences.chinese: 米德将军部下损失惨重，无力追赶李将军的残部。

sentences.english: Two people take agent certificate of approach and find a UN cheat.
sentences.chinese: 两人拿特工证找到一支国军残部骗吃喝。

definition: ruined army, defeated general (idiom); scattered remnants
to flee in disorder/defeated and in rout
to annihilate/to wipe out completely/to exterminate
to pursue and kill/to wipe out
to follow up a victory/to pursue retreating enemy
